Message.Title: Debt Ceiling: Will Obama Finally Cut Spending?..... Does a Cat Like to Swim?
Message.Msg: Obama won the other day... big new taxes and more government deficit spending, that's what an Obama victory means. Moody's, Fitch and S&P all made it clear that U.S. sovereign debt downgrades were advanced by Obama's victory... for those American's astute enough to notice the happenings in Greece, that's important, but for Obama voters, it's not worth the time to stop watching Justin Bieber on TV and take notice. For the last 4 years, we piled on close to $5 Trillion in federal debt. Obama did it, but blamed Bush as he promoted new laws that would perpetuate those huge deficits. What can we do?... after all, Obama is popular and only wants to tax and spend. We can call our Senators and Congressment and show them some support, that's what. Over the next 4 years, Obama will be trying to do everything he can to bankrupt our country in an ocean of entitlements, and deficits... anyone who does not see him as the enemy of America simply doesn't have his/her eyes open. Then, in the 2014 midterm elections, vote for people who will stand UP against the bankruptcy of our country... who will stand UP to Obama and neutralize the cancer of rampant socialism that is Obama's dream for America. Stand up. Our $16 Trillion National debt and bankrupt entitlements shout that the final battle to save America is RIGHT NOW. We don't HAVE 4 years to stop Mr. Obama... if we don't do it now, then we WILL be Greece... ... every economic metric and trajectory tells us that... we're greece by 2016 unless we stop this President now. S
